page.title: 05SHOPPING IN CHALFORD
page.content: There are several different types of shop in our area.In the valley there is a Post Office,and a shop which sells childrens' clothes and prams. There is also a barber's shop with a red and white pole outside.Each of the four small villages which make up our area has a Post Office.In Chalford Hill there is a butcher,an electrical supplier,a handyman store a clothes shop,a hairdresser and a take_away fish and chip shop.There are three general grocery stores.Both Bussage and Oakridge have food shops. The area really has very good shopping facilities.As long as people keep using the village shops they will survive,but if we go to the towns to buy everything our village shops will die.
